name: Blooming Lucite Flower Earrings - Vanessa
description:
Vanessa is popular and the girl who is always well dressed and put together. She enjoys the simple things in life, like good friends and sunny days.

These earrings feature wo Lucite flowers in coordinating shades with antique brass leaf caps. Small fire-polished glass beads create little 'stamens' and dangle from the flowers, moving freely as you do. Beautiful, delicate, and the epitome of femininity. Ear wires are plain antique brass.

Total length is approx. 2.5 inches.

==========
Color Options:

Moss: dark & kelly green flowers with green picasso glass
Berries and Cream: bright pink & raspberry flowers with cream glass
Waterfall: 'watercolor' blue & aqua flowers with aquamarine glass
Frost: white flowers & crystal glass

name: Lucite Blossom Lily Earrings - Sasha
description:
Sasha is fun, funky, and always keeps up with the current trends. She adores bright colors above all things and isn't afraid to be noticed.

Lovely, feminine flower earrings make the perfect statement accessory. Made with super lightweight layered lucite flowers in light lime green with kelly green tucked underneath. Antique brass bead caps and sparkling crystal add a vintage touch.

Ear wires are antique brass leverbacks with no nickel or lead. Total length is approx. 1.5 inches (3.2 cm). Larger flowers measure 3/4 inch at widest point (18mm).

==========
Color Options:

Lime: Light green & kelly green with antique brass
Lagoon: Powder blue & royal blue with antique brass
*Frost: Matte White & aqua with antique brass
*Candy Cane: Cherry red & white
*Evergreen: Dark green & white

*Photo coming soon!

name: Pressed Glass Flower Dangle Earrings - Jenna
description:
Jenna is a country girl and usually prefers cowboy boots to sparkling jewels. Despite this, she is naturally beautiful and doesn't always pass up the chance to dress up for a night out.

Smooth pressed glass flowers are accented with antique brass leaf caps and more glass beads in a contrasting shade. Cute and lightweight earrings that will add a feminine touch to any outfit.

Ear wires are simple antique brass shepherd's hooks (no nickel or lead). Total length is just over one inch (2.6 cm).

==========
Color Options:

Mossy Stone: light green picasso flowers, olive glass
Robin's Egg: pale turquoise picasso flowers, cream glass
Mistletoe: ruby red flowers, olive glass (not yet pictured)
Glow: aqua celsian flowers, beige glass

name: Suspended Lucite Petunia Earrings - Emma
description:
Emma lives by the phrase, "I would rather have roses on my table than diamonds on my neck." She adores the beauty of flowers and is never without her favorite pair of earrings.

These earrings are light and sweet. Lucite lily flowers hand-dyed by me in original colors gracefully swing from a short length of antique brass chain. Brass leaf-stamped caps and sparkling glass beads accent the flowers and add a contemporary feel.

Ear wires are simple antique brass shepherd's hooks.

==========
Color Options:

Violet: deep purple flowers & shimmery pinkish purple glass
Teal: muted teal green flowers & teal glass

name: Lucite Lily Earrings with Filigree Cones - Victoria
description:
Victoria prefers to be called Tori, but secretly loves her historic name. While she has a more conservative style, the occasional big purse or extravagant piece of jewelry is Tori's trademark.

Soft and graceful lucite lilies bloom out of antique-style brass filigree cones. The cones really make these earrings unique, like the original pressed tin ceilings in my favorite old pub in my hometown. These earrings represent the juxtaposition of old and new, with a lot of modern flair that makes these earrings truly original.

Small Swarovski Crystals in a coordinating shade add some sparkle and finish these earrings. Ear wires are nickel-free antique brass leverbacks, so you can relax and know your earrings will stay put.

Total length is approximately 2.75 inches (7 cm).

==========
Color Options:

Lemon: soft yellow flowers & yellow crystal
Aqua: cool blue flowers & aquamarine crystal
Pink: bright pink flowers & pink crystal
White: matte white flowers & clear crystal
Lime: bright green flowers & peridot crystal (not pictured)
